text.p: ForeFront Group Inc said Monday it introduced WebSeeker 3.0 which helps users access more than 100 Internet search engines when conducting a single comprehensive Internet search.

WebSeeker 3.0 includes ForeFront's proprietary content "push" technology to automatically give users version upgrades across the Internet. It is available to Windows 95 and NT users, the software company said.
Push technology delivers news and other content directly to a subscriber's computer.
